Staff, Very Rare (Requires Attunement by a Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard)
You have resistance to necrotic damage while you hold this staff.
The staff has 10 charges. It regains 1d6 + 4 charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff crumbles to ash and is destroyed.
Spells. While holding the staff, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPconjureminorvo]{conjure minor voidborn} (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPdoomoftheendle]{doom of the endless void} (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPdustandashes00]{dust and ashes} (4 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPtoothofthewyrm]{tooth of the wyrm} (1 charge).
